sendSMS.description: Send an SMS message to a phone number using Twilio

parameters.to: Recipient phone number in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890)
parameters.message: The SMS message content to send

getSMSHistory.description: Get recent SMS message history from Twilio

parameters.limit: Maximum number of messages to retrieve (default: 20, max: 50)

makeCall.description: Make a voice call using Twilio with TwiML instructions

parameters.to: Recipient phone number in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890)
parameters.twimlUrl: URL pointing to TwiML instructions for the call

getCallLogs.description: Get recent voice call logs from Twilio with status and duration

parameters.limit: Maximum number of call logs to retrieve (default: 20, max: 50)

sendWhatsApp.description: Send a WhatsApp message using Twilio WhatsApp Business API

parameters.to: Recipient WhatsApp number in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890)
parameters.message: The WhatsApp message content to send
